strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: Test your memory with this simple game

strings.GADGET_ABOUT:
Memory Game Gadget Copyright (c) 2007 Google Inc. Click anywhere within the gadget to begin a new game.
Repeat the sequence given by the game.
